column3: Huh. I guess there's no way to enter an actual HT or LF in here.
column6: Is there a limit to the size of text in one of these fields? I guess I don't really care, but it might be helpful to have some kind of sanity limit in the parser. 255 bytes or something like that. I know it does support UTF-8 text, so we're talking in bytes and not characters. OK. Yeah. I think that was more than 256.
